hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that a man asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ):“My father died and left behind wealth, but he did not make a will. Will it expiate for him if I give charity on his behalf?” He said: “Yes.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ مَاتَ وَلَمْ يُوصِ هَلْ يُتَصَدَّقُ عَنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: If A Person Dies Without Having Made A Will, Can Charity Be Given On His Behalf?
